item.title: Binance Alpha Launches GameBuild (GAME)
item.description: On August 10th, Binance Alpha launched GameBuild (GAME).

item.title: If Bitcoin surpasses $120,000, the cumulative short liquidation intensity of mainstream CEXs will reach $1.154 billion.
item.description: On August 10th, according to Coinglass data, in the event that Bitcoin surges above $120,000, the cumulative short liquidation intensity on mainstream CEXs will reach $1.154 billion.Conversely, if Bitcoin drops below $116,000, the cumulative long liquidation intensity on mainstream CEXs will be $950 million.BlockBeats Note: The liquidation chart does not disclose the precise number of contracts to be liquidated or the exact value of the contracts to be liquidated. The bars on the liquidation chart actually signify the relative significance of each liquidation cluster in relation to neighboring clusters, that is, the intensity.Therefore, the liquidation chart illustrates to what extent the price of the underlying asset will be impacted when it attains a certain level. A higher "liquidation bar" indicates that the price will undergo a more intense reaction due to a surge in liquidity once it reaches that level.

item.title: Meme Coin SPARK's Market Cap Surges Above $33 Million, with a 95% Spike in 24 Hours
item.description: On August 10th, based on GMGN data, on the Solana blockchain, the AI virtual creature concept Meme token SPARK had its market capitalization briefly exceed $33 million, reaching a new all-time high. It witnessed a 95% increase in the past 24 hours and a 24-hour trading volume of $26.2 million.BlockBeats reminds users that Meme coins usually lack practical use cases and experience significant price volatility. Therefore, investment should be made with caution.

item.title: Arthur Hayes acquires 41,628 HYPE tokens, worth $1.8 million
item.description: On August 10th, based on on-chain data, the address belonging to Arthur Hayes withdrew 41,628 HYPE tokens from Gate Exchange 40 minutes ago, with a value of $1.8 million.

item.title: A certain whale withdrew 274.22 BTC from a CEX after one month of dormancy, worth $32 million.
item.description: On August 10th, as monitored by OnchainLens, a whale address withdrew 274.22 BTC from Binance after being dormant for a month. The value of this withdrawal is $32 million. Currently, the whale holds 587.24 BTC, with a value of $69.24 million.Address: bc1qk2c3usel9wqcccxgrzcnmys3ry57algan3tsmx

item.title: Binance Alpha New Airdrop Claim Threshold: At least 237 Points in the First Stage
item.description: On August 10th, Binance announced in a post. Be prepared to claim the Binance Alpha airdrop at 15:00 today. The Binance Alpha airdrop will be distributed in two phases:Phase One (first 18 hours): Users who hold at least 237 Binance Alpha points can claim the airdrop.Phase Two (last 6 hours): Users holding at least 200 Binance Alpha points can participate in the airdrop on a first-come, first-served basis. If the rewards are not fully distributed, the points threshold will automatically decrease by 15 points per hour.

item.title: Upbit's daily trading volume surges over 45%: ETH, XRP, and PROVE currently hold the top three positions
item.description: On August 10th, according to CoinGecko data, within the past 24 hours, the trading volume on Upbit surged to $3.879 billion, experiencing a daily increase of 45.7%. The ETH/KRW trading pair accounted for 16.1% of the volume and ranked first. Next came XRP, PROVE, BTC, and SOL.

item.title: Russian Expert: Russian-American Summit in Alaska Could See Proposal for Ukraine Ceasefire Plan
item.description: On August 10th, Dmitry Suslov, the Deputy Director of the European and International Studies Department at the Higher School of Economics in Russia and an expert at the Valdai Club, informed Sputnik News that after the meeting between Russian President Putin and US President Trump in Alaska, they might propose a ceasefire plan for Ukraine. Suslov stated, "We shouldn't anticipate an immediate ceasefire agreement directly. Instead, we should concentrate on a ceasefire conditions plan that is jointly agreed upon by Russia and the US. Then, we should strive to enter into final negotiations in order to thoroughly resolve the conflict."This plan may comprise the complete withdrawal of Ukrainian forces from the territory of the Donetsk People's Republic. Meanwhile, the current line of contact in Zaporizhia and Kherson oblasts would be maintained as the final border. And Russian forces might withdraw from certain parts of Sumy, Kharkiv, and Dnipropetrovsk oblasts. (Finance 10)

item.title: James Wynn admits to overleveraging, succumbing to the spotlight effect, leading to a meltdown in the end.
item.description: August 10th, James Wynn put out a post and summed it up like this: "In this world, there is no such thing as a mistake. There are only lessons. Whenever I encounter what others might call a mistake or a failure in my life, I always manage to learn from it. The most significant lesson recently was when I turned 3 million dollars into 100 million dollars but then lost it all in front of everyone.""That time was extremely intense - with adrenaline pumping, chaos all around, and a complete madness. I faced it with a smile and a laugh. This is another lesson - I got overly leveraged and was blinded by all the 'attention,' losing complete control of my emotions. I don't want to change anything that has happened. Even if you were to send me back to that moment and give me the choice to cash out, I wouldn't. I value this lesson more. Money is boundless; it is everywhere and easy to make.""When I reached 100 million dollars, you cheered for me. And when I fell to the bottom, you laughed at

item.title: SOON surges over 100% in 24 hours, reaching a market capitalization of $1.24 billion
item.description: On August 10th, based on HTX market data, SOON witnessed a surge of more than 100% within the past 24 hours. It is currently trading at $0.518 and has a market capitalization of $124 million.
